column3: I was well aware of the Snooze hype before I even walked in the doors. For those wondering if the hype and the (almost guaranteed) wait at the door are worth it: Yes! The wait is because the entire process from being seated to getting your check is slow. This is a "sit-down and enjoy your meal" kind of place
column4: not a "grab a bite to eat and go" kind of place. You come to Snooze for the experience first
column5: food second. Not to say the food is forgettable (it's not)
column6: but your experience at Snooze is slow and methodical. Enjoy your company (if you brought someone; if not
